item.title: R vs Excel: lookup and text functions
item.description:
Content Lookup functions in R Text functions in R Lookup functions in Excel Text functions in Excel Summary
Background Last week Saturday, I attended an Excel workshop which is organised by my course society at my campus. On that day, I have learnt some basic techniques and concepts in Microsoft Excel. Overall, the learning topic of the day can be categorized into three sub-sections which are lookup functions, logical functions and text functions.
